page.title: 07Industry
page.content: Market Harborough is a market town which has some industries.The main industry in Harborough is{Hawker {Siddeley Tungstone Batteries.}It employs 600 people and of those,about 80% live in Market Harborough.Other industries are{Symingtons}which makes food,soup,desserts and table creams, {Crosby Valves}which makes valves for oil rigs{Country Kitchen Foods}which grows mushrooms,and the{Harborough {Rubber Company}which makes things out of rubber.There is also a small industrial estate.In Harborough, we have got low unemployment compared with the national figure.We sent some questionaires to our parents,and out of{51 replies,}we found that{39}people live and work in Harborough,and{12 work out of town.There were{45}people employed by someone else and{6}who were self-employed
